header.title: Animation w/ GSAP
header.description: High-performance web animations and interactive storytelling using GSAP and ScrollTrigger

intro.title: Why JS Animation?
intro.description: There are situations where CSS alone is not sufficient. When you need complex timing control, sequential/parallel movements, SVG or Canvas area control, and scroll-based interactions, the JS animation library GSAP becomes a powerful tool.

timing.title: Precise Timing Control
timing.description: Complex sequences, delays, and speed control that are difficult with CSS.

complex.title: Complex Movements
complex.description: Create timelines where multiple elements interact and move sequentially.

beyond.title: Beyond DOM Control
beyond.description: Animate properties of SVG, Canvas, and Three.js objects.

scroll.title: Scroll Interaction
scroll.description: Easily implement effects where UI changes or pins based on scroll progress.

to.title: gsap.to()
to.description: Animate from current state to specified values

from.title: gsap.from()
from.description: Animate from specified state to original state

easing.title: Easing (Acceleration)
easing.description: The most important factor determining the feel of an animation. "Start fast and stop smoothly" is the basic principle of UI motion.

scrollTrigger.title: ScrollTrigger
scrollTrigger.description: Control animations based on scroll position. Try scrolling inside the box below.
scrollTrigger.scrubDescription: Moves in sync with scroll speed.
scrollTrigger.pinnedDescription: This section is pinned for a moment.

svg.title: SVG Animation
svg.description: Using stroke-dasharray and stroke-dashoffset properties, you can implement handwriting or line drawing effects.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Even fancy animations harm user experience if they stutter. You must understand the browser's rendering pipeline and only touch optimized properties.

good.title: Good (Cheap Properties)
good.description: Utilizes GPU acceleration and does not trigger Layout (Reflow).

bad.title: Bad (Expensive Properties)
bad.description: Forces layout recalculation and drastically degrades performance.

devtools.title: Using DevTools:
devtools.description: In the Performance tab, start recording to check if FPS drops below 60 and if 'Layout Shift' occurs.
